requirements_en.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 7\8\10
  • Processor: Dual Core CPU or equivalent
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
requirements_en.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Microsoft Windows 10 or higher
  • Processor: Celeron 1.5(1.5G) or higher
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 460 or higher
  • Storage: 4 GB available space

  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1GB VRAM
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
